Question.Subject: Demonoid invitation code?
Question.Content:
Hello,
I am looking for an invitation code to demonoid. I would like to learn how to upload my torrents as I have some pretty decent stuff to share.
If you have any questions for me please do not hesitate to ask and thanks for your time.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Demonoid is now open to the public for registrations so be quick. If you're lucky enough to get in then you'll have to look out for an activation email that will be from gate_keeper and NOT Demonoid. This can sometimes end up in your Spam folder so be sure to check there if you don't see it. Please try and give back at least as much as you take so anything above 1.1 is always appreciated.

Answer.Content:
if u want do that, you have get registered in the
http://www.demonoidinvitationcode.com/ link

Demonoid is now open to the public for registrations so be quick. If you're lucky enough to get in then you'll have to look out for an activation email that will be from gate_keeper and NOT Demonoid. This can sometimes end up in your Spam folder so be sure to check there if you don't see it. Please try and give back at least as much as you take so anything above 1.1 is always appreciated.
